item.title: Book Your Appointment with COMM+D Online!
item.description: Are you working on a writing assignment, oral presentation, or visual design project? Whether you’re at the beginning brainstorming stages or finishing up your final revisions, the Center for Global Communication+Design (Comm+D) can help, so be sure to schedule an appointment with a member of the Center’s trained staff!

item.title: Farewell Reception for R. May Lee | July 29
item.description: Date: Tuesday, July 29, 2025 3:30 PM - 5:00 PM - Please join us for a farewell reception in honor of Rosaline May Lee, our Vice President & Chief Strategy Officer for Institutional Impact. May has accepted a new position as the next president of Olin College of Engineering and will be leaving RPI at the end of the month. Please join us to thank her and wish her all the best in her next endeavor.

item.title: SUNY Adirondack Adventure Course | July 30 (Waiver Required)
item.description: Date: Wednesday, July 30, 2025 8:00 AM - 3:00 PM - We are inviting you to attend a free trip to the SUNY Adirondack outdoor challenge course. Transportation is provided. Join other RPI faculty, staff & students on the course. Attendees must sign a trip waiver @ JEC 2012 on one of the following dates: July 9-11 or July 23-25 between 9-12p or 1-4p. Meet @ the North Lot 7:45a; bus leaves 8a. Free lunch @ SUNY campus 1-1:45p. Leave SUNY @ 1:45p to return approximately 3p. Space is limited;…

item.title: Am I Enough of Me: Theatrical Production and Research Project | July 24
item.description: Thursday / July 24, 2025 at 6:00 pm Am I Enough of Me concerns individuality and timing. This theatrical performance tells the story of what can happen when our dreams are put on hold. Three college graduates must choose between their passion projects and a dystopian corporate future. Their choice is explored through multiple mediums including musical theater, augmented reality, AI video, audience interaction, and art song. Presented by Communication and Media Department Performance Cliff Watson

item.title: Webinars to be Included in Webex Suite
item.description: The Webex Suite meeting platform will include Webinars as of July 31, 2025. All Webinars, including those scheduled prior to this date but running after July 31, will be run on the new platform. In order to utilize the new experience, the installed Webex App must be version 45.4 or newer. If you need assistance to update your Webex App, please submit a support request.

item.title: Nominations for the RAA Teaching Award Sought
item.description:
Date: 7/23/2025 to 7/31/2025 Nominations are being accepted for the 2025 Rensselaer Alumni Association (RAA) Teaching Award, and are due by July 31, 2025. This award recognizes current members of the faculty for their outstanding teaching techniques, contributions to the campus experience, and commitment to students. For more information or to submit a nomination, visit https://app.smartsheet.com/b/form…
